page.title: 08Kirk Balk School,Hoyland.
page.content:
I live in a council flat on the Cloughs Estate in Hoyland.During the week,except during holidays,I go to Kirk Balk Secondary School.
School starts at 8.50 a.m. and finishes at 3.40 p.m.The day begins with a form period which lasts 20 minutes.Then we go to our lessons.My favourite lesson is English because we do plays and study novels,which I enjoy.
The school serves dinners which everybody moans about but which are really good value at 50p each for meat,three vegetables,and a pudding.
